articles.description: With much of the property industry now insistent that some sort of extension to the stamp duty holiday is needed to avoid a catastrophic cliff-edge next March, a petition may turn out to be a way of reaching the goal.
articles.content:
A petition has been launched demanding a stamp duty holiday extension.
